definition: to give up defending/to yield/to surrender
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: The enemy was advancing. The snow was stained with blood.
sentences.chinese: 首都被迫棄守，敵人步步進逼，鮮血將白雪浸染。

sentences.english: The town was forced to yield after a long siege.
sentences.chinese: 該城受長期圍困而被迫棄守。

sentences.english: Wu the day see half the battle, decided to abandon keep PangCheng retreat.
sentences.chinese: 吳霸天見大勢已去，決定棄守撤退龐城。

sentences.english: They surrendered the fortress to the enemy.
